resources.string: Notifications for student activity during the exam.
This app requires access to the do not disturb mode on your device to disable notifications in the reader. Please enable it in the next screen!
Document %s in exams %s was not found. Do you want to…
Document %s in exam %s was not found. Do you want to…
Do you REALLY want to exit?
There are still students connected. Do you REALLY want to quit the protocol?
This document is not allowed in the exam. However if you are certain it is, ask your professor to type his password for you.
Private hotspot is not available prior Android version 8, instead, you have to use the classic hotspot. For this, please disable mobile data!!! Do you want to continue to the hotspot settings page?
Location services need to be enabled in order to scan for wifi. Do you want to enable them?
There are still students with unchecked documents. They will loose access to them during exam if you lock their devices.
Wifi needs to be enabled for this app to work. Do you want to enable it?

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranties of MERCHANTABILITY, SATISFACTORY QUALITY, or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.\n\nAs a student, you must test this application with your teacher at the beginning of the course with your device, because although Android has a high level of compatibility among devices, yours might not work well with this application and you wouldn\'t risk a failure on exam day, would you?

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranties of MERCHANTABILITY, SATISFACTORY QUALITY, or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.\n\nAs a teacher, you must test this application with your students at the beginning of the course, because although Android has a high level of compatibility among devices, some student\'s devices might not work well with this application and you should not risk a failure on exam day.

plurals.name: notification_drawer_has_been_opened
plurals.item: Notification drawer has been opened once
Notification drawer has been opened %d times

resources.string: Student %s has terminated his reader app!
The app needs access to the notification policy to activate do not disturb mode!
The specified exam does already exist!
This app needs gps to create the hotspot!
A student with your name does already participate in this exam. Please change yours. (Add a number or similar)
Host uses a newer protocol. Please update your app!
This app needs internal storage access for you to choose the allowed documents in the exam.
If not all documents are allowed, specify at least one!
Please specify the Number of pages for the document!
This button is used to add a document for usage in the exam. For best results, use the "docs" app to pick them.
This button is used to register a new exam.
Select this checkbox to allow all documents to be used.
If you want to check, whether a tab really represents a student device, tap it. A lighthouse should appear on the students device.
This button is used to delete highlighted document. You may highlight documents with a long press.
This button is used to delete highlighted exam. You may highlight an exam with a long press.
This button is used to edit a highlighted exam. You may highlight an exam with a long press.
This shows the used file handles of the app. Android only allows for 128 handles in total.
If you delete a document from the list, the field updates when leaving the editor.
Use this switch to either use your facilities wifi to connect to the students or open a private hotspot.
Use this switch to enter exam mode and to deny access to all rejected documents on the students devices.
Expand the menu to get access to the preferences where you SHOULD enter your username!
Here you must enter a password so you can unlock documents on the students device that the algorithm might have wrongly rejected.
Use this switch to scan for teacher devices in your network and the tap the appearing device below, that you want to connect to.
Use this switch to make your device visible to the students. Their devices show up as tabs below.
